body: Does anyone know how i could spawn a world that has a space of void 300 blocks by 600 blocks? I'm trying to make a map but i don't know how to make a void this big without destroying the blocks manually.
body_tagged: Does anyone know how i could spawn a world that has a space of void 300 blocks by 600 blocks? I'm trying to make a map but i don't know how to make a void this big without destroying the blocks manually.
title: How would i do this?

replies.body: You can either download a Void map or find a server that you can build on
replies.body_tagged: You can either download a Void map or find a server that you can build on

replies.body: Do you know a server i could build on?
replies.body_tagged: Do you know a server i could build on?

replies.body:
alexanderjoe10 has a build server.
Contact him regarding that.
replies.body_tagged:
alexanderjoe10 has a build server.
Contact him regarding that.

replies.body: It's very easy is to get a void map and many mods.
replies.body_tagged: It's very easy is to get a void map and many mods.

replies.body:
I use a different way
1. make a new world and take flat
2. go on costomise and in the bar at the top then just write 12
3.then let the world spawn and place a block.
4. then u aheva  void map in a few minutes, cause the sand falls away. but better not destroy the one block, or you will be in a world full of void :P
